gemini_config.system_instruction: Create a transparent breakdown of how sponsor funds will be used (e.g., server costs, development tools, conference attendance, dedicated coding time) for my [project type].

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Create a transparent breakdown of how sponsor funds will be used (e.g., server costs, development to..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
